Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2011 10:09AM kadorazio wrote: Hi guys.  I started my chem in January also.  Tomorrow is my second dose (AC) and I am dreading it.  I got soooo sick from the first one, in bed/vomiting for 4 days.  My hair started falling out today - also very depressing.  I have been so upbeat about this whole cancer crap until today.  I keep wondering how I'm going to make through the next 3 months!   I am 41, single, no children, just cats.  Triple negative breast cancer.  Getting 4 dose dense treatments with AC and 1 taxotere followed by bilateral mastectomy.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in January '11 JulieH leftfootforward

Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2011 12:18PM kadorazio wrote: I have a feeling I am not going to be an attractive bald person...nor do I really want to wear a wig!
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in January '11 JulieH leftfootforward
